00027 #ifndef _KCHE_TREE_INDIRECT_HEAP_H_
00028 #define _KCHE_TREE_INDIRECT_HEAP_H_
00029 
00030 // Include the std::less predicate (used by default).
00031 #include <functional>
00032 
00033 namespace kche_tree {
00034 
00045 template <typename T, typename Compare = std::less<T>, typename idx = unsigned int>
00046 class IndirectHeap {
00047 protected:
00048 
00049   mutable const T *data; 
00050   idx *heap; 
00051   idx *inverse; 
00052 
00053   unsigned int size; 
00054   unsigned int used; 
00055   unsigned int last; 
00056 
00057   const Compare &compare; 
00058   static const idx root = 1; 
00059 
00060   inline idx parent_idx(idx index) { return index >> 1; } 
00061   inline idx left_idx (idx index) { return index << 1; } 
00062   inline idx right_idx(idx index) { return (index << 1) + 1; } 
00063 
00064   inline void swap_elements(idx i1, idx i2); 
00065   inline void heapify_element(idx index); 
00066   bool heapify_upwards(idx index); 
00067   void heapify_downwards(idx index); 
00068 
00069 public:
00070 
00071   // Constructors and destructors.
00072   IndirectHeap(const T *data, unsigned int size, unsigned int maxSize = 0, const Compare &c = Compare());
00073   IndirectHeap(const IndirectHeap &heap);
00074   ~IndirectHeap();
00075 
00076   // Assignment operator (only the heap structure is copied, not the data pointer).
00077   IndirectHeap &operator = (const IndirectHeap &heap);
00078 
00079   // Comparison operator (only heap structure is compared, not data pointers or data itself).
00080   bool operator == (const IndirectHeap &heap) const;
00081 
00082   // Data pointer adjustment.
00083   void setData(const T *data); 
00084 
00085   // Usual heap operations.
00086   bool push(idx index); 
00087   T &pop(); 
00088 
00089   // Extended heap operations.
00090   bool inHeap(idx index) const; 
00091   bool remove(idx index); 
00092   bool update(idx index); 
00093   void updateAll(); 
00094   bool swap(idx index1, idx index2); 
00095 
00096   // Subscript operators.
00097   const T & operator [](idx index) const;
00098   T & operator [](idx index);
00099 
00100   // Heap properties.
00101   unsigned int maxSize() const;
00102   unsigned int dataSize() const;
00103   unsigned int count() const;
00104   bool empty() const;
00105   idx topIndex() const;
00106   T &top() const;
00107 };
00108 
00109 } // namespace kche_tree
00110 
00111 // Template implementation.
00112 #include "indirect_heap.tpp"
00113 
00114 #endif
